目をまるくする: (めをまるくする) - to stare in wonder; to be amazed
目をみはる: (めをみはる) - to be wide-eyed (in surprise); to open one's eyes wide (in wonder); to be amazed (at, by)
目をむく: (めをむく) - to open one's eyes wide (in anger, surprise, etc.); to goggle at
目を三角にして怒る: (めをさんかくにしておこる) - to be really angry
目を三角にする: (めをさんかくにする) - to look daggers at someone; to be angry
目を丸くする: (めをまるくする) - to stare in wonder; to be amazed
目を付ける: (めをつける) - to have an eye on; to zero in on
目を伏せる: (めをふせる) - to cast down one's eyes
目を光らす: (めをひからす) - to keep a watchful eye on
目を光らせる: (めをひからせる) - to keep a watchful eye on
目を凝らす: (めをこらす) - to strain one's eyes; to look closely; to stare at
目を剥く: (めをむく) - to open one's eyes wide (in anger, surprise, etc.); to goggle at
目を反らす: (めをそらす) - to look away; to avert one's eyes
目を合わせる: (めをあわせる) - to make eye contact
目を向ける: (めをむける) - to shift one's attention to; to shift one's focus on
目を喜ばす: (めをよろこばす) - to feast one's eyes (on)
目を回す: (めをまわす) - to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness; to be astounded/to astonished; to have a busy time/to be hectic
目を奪われる: (めをうばわれる) - to be captivated (visually)
目を引く: (めをひく) - to attract notice; to catch the eye; to stand out
目を悦ばす: (めをよろこばす) - to feast one's eyes (on)
目を掛ける: (めをかける) - to gaze at/to stare at/to set one's eyes on; to favor/to favour/to be partial to
目を掠める: (めをかすめる) - to do in secret
目を放す: (めをはなす) - to take one's eyes off
目を楽しませる: (めをたのしませる) - to be pleasure to the eye; to delight the eye; to please the eye; to feast one's eyes on
目を止める: (めをとめる) - to take notice (of); to pay attention (to)
目を泳がせる: (めをおよがせる) - to avoid meeting someone's gaze; to not look someone in the eyes
目を留める: (めをとめる) - to take notice (of); to pay attention (to)
目を疑う: (めをうたがう) - to doubt one's own eyes
目を白黒させる: (めをしろくろさせる) - to dart one's eyes about; to be surprised; to be bewildered; to be confused; to be flustered
目を皿にする: (めをさらにする) - open one's eyes wide; with eyes open like saucers
目を盗む: (めをぬすむ) - to do something behind someone's back; to do something stealthily
目を真ん円にする: (めをまんまるにする) - to be very surprised
目を眩ます: (めをくらます) - to deceive; to blind the eyes of
目を細くする: (めをほそくする) - to smile with one's whole face; to squint
目を細める: (めをほそめる) - to close one's eyes partly/to squint; to smile with one's whole face/to look fondly at
目を覆う: (めをおおう) - to avert one's eyes; to avoid looking straight at something; to cover one's eyes
目を見張る: (めをみはる) - to be wide-eyed (in surprise); to open one's eyes wide (in wonder); to be amazed (at, by)
目を覚ます: (めをさます) - to wake up; to sober up/to come to one's senses/to become enlightened
目を走らせる: (めをはしらせる) - to glance at; to look at; to scan; to run one's eyes over
目を輝かす: (めをかがやかす) - for one's eyes to gleam; eyes sparkling; with shining eyes
目を通す: (めをとおす) - to scan; to look over
目を逸らす: (めをそらす) - to look away; to avert one's eyes
目を配る: (めをくばる) - to keep an eye on; to keep a watchful eye on
目を閉じる: (めをとじる) - to close one's eyes/to lower one's eyelids/to shut one's eyes; to die/to breathe one's last
目を離す: (めをはなす) - to take one's eyes off
目一杯: (めいっぱい) - with all one's might
目交い: (まなかい) - between one's eyes; before one's eyes; space where one's left and right eyesight meet
目付かる: (めっかる) - to be found; to be discovered
目付き: (めつき) - look; expression of the eyes; eyes
目付ける: (めっける) - (var. of 見付ける)  to discover; to find
目付柱: (めつけばしら) - downstage right pillar (on a Noh stage) used as a positioning guidepost for actors
目伏し: (まぶし) - look; expression of the eyes; eyes
目偏: (めへん) - (as in 眺) kanji "eye" radical at left (radical 109)
目元: (めもと) - eyes/expression of the eyes; (orig.meaning) area around the eyes/skin round one's eyes
目元千両: (めもとせんりょう) - (yoji) beautiful eyes; bright-eyed; there being a sublime charm about one's eyes
目元千両口元万両: (めもとせんりょうくちもとまんりょう) - (proverb)  (woman with) beautiful eyes and mouth
目先: (めさき) - near future; immediate; before one's eyes; under one's nose
目先がきく: (めさきがきく) - to have foresight; to be farsighted; to be nimble-witted
目先が利く: (めさきがきく) - to have foresight; to be farsighted; to be nimble-witted
目先相場: (めさきそうば) - (yoji) the market trend in the near future
目八分: (めはちぶ) - below eye level; about eight-tenths full
目処がたつ: (めどがたつ) - the prospects for a solution look brighter; there is hope that we can (accomplish a certain thing)
目処がつく: (めどがつく) - to have a rough idea of what the situation is
目処が付く: (めどがつく) - to have a rough idea of what the situation is
目処が立つ: (めどがたつ) - the prospects for a solution look brighter; there is hope that we can (accomplish a certain thing)
目出度し目出度し: (めでたしめでたし) - and they all lived happily ever after (traditional ending to stories)
目分量: (めぶんりょう) - measuring by eye
目利安: (メリアス) - knitting (spa: medias, por: meias); hosiery; knitted goods
目刺: (めざし) - dried sardines (held together by a bamboo skewer or string piercing the eye sockets)
目刺し: (めざし) - dried sardines (held together by a bamboo skewer or string piercing the eye sockets)
目前: (もくぜん) - before one's very eyes; under one's nose; imminence; close at hand
目力: (めじから) - the ability to convey strong emotions with his eyes (for an actor); eyes that convey a strong sense of purpose
目印: (めじるし) - mark; sign; landmark; benchmark
目合い: (めあい) - mesh size of a net
目大千鳥: (メダイチドリ) - lesser sand plover (Charadrius mongolus)
目安箱: (めやすばこ) - suggestion box/comment box; complaints box placed in front of the supreme court (Edo period)
目尻: (mejiri) -  canto externo, canto externo do olho
目尻を下げる: (めじりをさげる) - to look happy/to look pleased; to make eyes at (someone)/to ogle
